ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.fragment

Interface GameFragment.GameFragmentCallback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainActivity
    Enclosing class:
    GameFragment

    public static interface GameFragment.GameFragmentCallback
    Callback interface offers methods upon user interaction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loadGameScoresForDrawer(long[] gameIds)
      Loads the game scores from the database and sets them in the navigation drawer.
      void onGameChanged(byte newGameNumber)
      Tells activity that the game has been changed.
      void onGameStatsOpened(long gameId, byte gameNumber)
      Tells activity to open new StatsFragment with current game id and game number.
      void onSeriesStatsOpened()
      Tells activity to open new StatsFragment with current series.
      void resetAutoAdvanceTimer()
      Starts the auto advance timer.
      void setAutoAdvanceConditions(android.view.View clickToAdvance, android.widget.TextView textViewStatus, boolean enabled, int delay)
      Sets auto advance values in activity.
      void stopAutoAdvanceTimer()
      Stops the auto advance timer.
      void updateGameScore(byte gameNumber, short gameScore)
      Invoked when a score is updated.

    • Method Detail

      • onGameStatsOpened

        void onGameStatsOpened(long gameId,
                       byte gameNumber)
        Tells activity to open new StatsFragment with current game id and game number.
        Parameters:
        gameId - id of the game to display
        gameNumber - number in a series of the game to display

      • onSeriesStatsOpened

        void onSeriesStatsOpened()
        Tells activity to open new StatsFragment with current series.

      • onGameChanged

        void onGameChanged(byte newGameNumber)
        Tells activity that the game has been changed.
        Parameters:
        newGameNumber - number of the new game, starting at index 0

      • setAutoAdvanceConditions

        void setAutoAdvanceConditions(android.view.View clickToAdvance,
                              android.widget.TextView textViewStatus,
                              boolean enabled,
                              int delay)
        Sets auto advance values in activity.
        Parameters:
        clickToAdvance - view to click to advance ball
        textViewStatus - text view to display updates
        enabled - indicates if the timer should be enabled
        delay - seconds of inactivity before auto advancing

      • resetAutoAdvanceTimer

        void resetAutoAdvanceTimer()
        Starts the auto advance timer.

      • stopAutoAdvanceTimer

        void stopAutoAdvanceTimer()
        Stops the auto advance timer.

      • updateGameScore

        void updateGameScore(byte gameNumber,
                     short gameScore)
        Invoked when a score is updated.
        Parameters:
        gameNumber - number of the game
        gameScore - score of the game

      • loadGameScoresForDrawer

        void loadGameScoresForDrawer(long[] gameIds)
        Loads the game scores from the database and sets them in the navigation drawer.
        Parameters:
        gameIds - ids of games to load
